title: Support multiple IDs in done command
description: Allow: ./fuel done fuel-a fuel-b fuel-c. Update DoneCommand to accept variadic ID argument. Document in CLAUDE.md and fuel-guidelines.md.

title: Add size field to task schema (xs/s/m/l/xl). Add --size flag to add command. Add --size filter to ready/list commands. Use for model routing: xs/s → local LLM, m → standard, l/xl → top-tier

Add guidelines command that outputs CLAUDE.md snippet
description: Simple command that prints the fuel task management guidelines. Users copy/paste into their CLAUDE.md or AGENTS.md. Use fuel-guidelines.md as the template source.

Add in_progress status support
description: 1. Add 'in_progress' to valid statuses in TaskService. 2. ready() excludes in_progress tasks. 3. Add './fuel start <id>' command to claim a task (sets status=in_progress). 4. Update docs.

TaskA

CONTRACT: Expand task schema in TaskService. Add fields: description (string|null), type (enum: bug|feature|task|epic|chore, default task), priority (int 0-4, default 2), labels (array of strings). Update create() to accept these. JSON output includes all fields. Tests must verify schema.
